_desc_project: 專案名稱，會影響輸出資料夾的命名
_desc_models: 指定各階段使用的模型檔名 (需包含 .safetensors)
_desc_remix: Remix 模式設定。conflict_keywords 可手動指定要刪除的 Tag (如 ['hair'] )，若留空則只降低權重
_desc_gen: 若想覆蓋 settings.py 的預設長寬，可在這裡指定
_desc_seed: base_seed 設為 -1 代表全隨機，否則會固定種子以利重現
_desc_header: 人物特徵的基本 Prompt，會自動加到所有場景前
character_header: 1girl, solo,(black hair, long hair, straight hair:1.2),school uniform, sailor collar,pleated skirt,miniskirt, cute face, blush, smile, delicate expression,(looking at viewer:1.2),

scenes.prompt: (sitting, sitting on grass:1.2), grassy hill,(waving, one hand up, arm up:1.1),(river, water, river background:1.2),pov, summer, playful atmosphere, outdoor setting, sunlight glow,blue sky, clouds, day, nature, scenery,(upper body, dynamic close-up:1.1)
